description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Radiant

Standard, At-Will

Reach 3

+34 vs AC; 2d8+11 damage, and ongoing radiant 15 radiant damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard, At-Will

Reach 3

+34 vs AC; 3d8+8 damage.

At-Will ✦ Teleportation

Minor, At-Will

The dragon teleports 5 squares, makes a claw attack, teleports 5 squares, and makes a claw attack against a different target.

Recharge 5-6

Minor, Recharge

Reach 3

+32 vs Fortitude; 4d10+8 damage, and the target is pushed 3 squares.

At-Will

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 10

The target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses against the dragon's attacks until the dragon uses this power against another target.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Radiant

Standard, Recharge

Close blast 5

+32 vs Reflex; 4d10+6 radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it

Encounter ✦ Radiant

Standard, Encounter

Close burst 10

Targets up to four enemies; +32 vs Reflex; 4d6+5 damage, and the target takes ongoing 15 radiant damage and is dazed (save ends both). Effect: The dragon teleports to a space in the burst.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard, Encounter

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +32 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Teleportation

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When the dragon is hit by an attack

The dragon gains a +4 bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, the dragon teleports 6 squares.

HP 1052; Bloodied 526 ; see also bloodied breath
Resist 25 radiant 		Init +27 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 44Fort 41Ref 43Will 41
Speed 10, fly 12 (hover), overland flight 15, teleport 10
Ability ScoresStr 27 (+22)
Con 23 (+20)		Dex 32 (+25)
Int 25 (+21)		Wis 27 (+22)
Cha 25 (+21)
Languages Common, Draconic, Supernal
Alignment Evil
Skills Diplomacy +26, History +26, Insight +27, Intimidate +26, Religion +26Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 32 | Insight 37
